paragraphs.title: notebook2Py
Reload Data
paragraphs.text:
from pyspark.sql.context import HiveContext

sqlContext = HiveContext(sc)
sqlContext.read.parquet("/tmp/hive/hive/warehouse/videos").write.saveAsTable("videos",mode="overwrite")

paragraphs.title: Restart
paragraphs.errorMessage:
